page.title: 05FENN FARM
page.content: MR MACPHERSON, THE FARMER, COMES FROM A FARMING FAMILY AND TOLD US THAT HE LIKED FARMING,FINDING IT SATISFYING(MOST OF THE TIME).HE LIKES FISHING AND SAID IT WAS GOOD TO FISH SOMETIMES WHEN OTHER PEOPLE HAD TO BE AT WORK. HE EMPLOYS ONE WORKER BUT ENJOYS DRILLING HIS FIRLDS HIMSELF.THE FARM IS IN A VALLEY WHERE TWO STREAMS MEET.60 ACRES ARE TOO HILLY & WET TO GROW CROPS SO HE BREEDS COWS FOR CALVES WHICH OTHER FARMERS FATTEN. THEY SPEND 7 MONTHS ON PASTURE AND 5 INDOORS.HE GROWS THE BARLEY TO FEED THEM. HE HAS ABOUT 100 ACRES OF WHEAT, 100 OF BARLEY AND 20 OF PEAS & BEANS.ON ABOUT 12 ACRES THEY GROW HAY.
